thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 29 of 7354
thread.title: Kevin

author: Kevin
title: Kevin
text:
B&H's prices have been the same price as Amazon's--on occasion less expensive--on rarer occasions a little more.
I like shopping with B&H for camera supplies because they are trusted in their field, are focussed (no pun intended) on camera-type products mostly, and offer better warranties--or at least, it seems to me, warranties that are easier to use...though I have not had the occasion to use one yet.
Also, they have delivered several items without a hitch--so that is good.
I have bought some refurbished cameras on B&H--though they are coming now--so I have not used them yet--but I am sure they will be fine.
I purchased a WG gimbal from them some time back--and haven't had any problems with it.
thanks
